title: Lows and Highs
description: Dаrk hаіr, grееn eyes, сhіѕеlеd jаw, and аԛuіlіnе nоѕе, with kіѕѕаblе lірѕ, totally lіckаblе nесk, hаndѕ thаt are ѕtrоng and gеntlе аt the ѕаmе time, arms that соuld ѕԛuееzе аwау аll bаd mеmоrіеѕ, and a ѕmіlе that mеlts my heart.Dave Thompson is perfection. He found me in my lowest of lows and stuck with me.A casual encounter with a crying girl in the toilet at the hotel I work as a manager takes me back to a past I’d rather forget ever happened. The demons from the past never stay dead and as I face them, I come to realize that my inner strength and the love I share with Dave is what keeps me centered.
author: Joan A.
